meanings.def: expecting good things to happen or something to be successful; showing this feeling
examples: We are now taking a more optimistic view.
optimistic about something She's not very optimistic about the outcome of the talks.
optimistic that… They are cautiously optimistic that the reforms will take place.
I think you're being a little over-optimistic.
On an optimistic note, the survey found children around the world are very resilient.
He remained strongly optimistic that an agreement could be reached.
He's very optimistic about his chances.
an essentially optimistic view of human nature
